title: Rana Foroohar: New Ground Rules for Digital Markets
itunes:title: Rana Foroohar: New Ground Rules for Digital Markets
description: FT columnist and associate editor Rana Foroohar discusses how the disruptions and excessive complexity of digital markets are benefitting the powerful and why we need clear new values and ground rules for these markets as we enter the post-pandemic landscape.
content:encoded: FT columnist and associate editor Rana Foroohar discusses how the disruptions and excessive complexity of digital markets are benefitting the powerful and why we need clear new values and ground rules for these markets as we enter the post-pandemic landscape.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
